thread.title: High school is the 'home of regular massive brawls' | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: High school is the 'home of regular massive brawls' | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: High school is the 'home of regular massive brawls' | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad High school from hell: Teachers have been BANNED from punishing students at school where mass brawls and dozens of arrests are now a part of every day life Terry High School has been scene of mass brawls among students where videos of fights have gone viral in last few years A teacher who didn't want to be identified believes new policies at the school 'deter teachers' from punishing children involved in fights The Southern Poverty Law Center said in 2015 school year there were 31 arrests at the school - a 400% increase of school -based arrests over three years Most recent brawl occurred at Terry High School on Monday and video of that fight went viral as officials said six of the teens involved were arrested Officials with the Hinds County School District say the high school has programs in place to offer session on bullying prevention and conflict resolution Published: 04:20 GMT, 2 February 2017 | Updated: 06:57 GMT, 2 February 2017 24 shares
